title: Weird FPS Lag
body: I play in Oceania severs and when I play with my friends I get 60 frames which I have capped it at. When I play alone I get 20 FPS and in team fights I get almost 4. Playing on an HP laptop and all my setting are on performance settings. Any suggestions to fix?

replies.body: These drops in frames can happen if you have outdated drivers or bad game files, regardless of the in-game settings placed.  I recommend running through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help make sure your PC is tuned up.  Test it in a custom and let me know if it helps!

Yeah well i am having the same problem as you... I was playing fine with 100 fps but ... i entered a game and i saw that my fps are 20... I was freaked out :P I tried to fix it with Malwarebytes and i removed some threats, then i restarted my pc but my fps was the same... The whole time on the game i am having around 20-30 fps and i cant play... I think its riot fault and i will wait for the next patch. I hope riot will fix some bugs and also i hope we will be able to play the game again because it is really hard to play a game with 20 Fps xD
